definition: to declare at the outset (idiom)

justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: That part of the follow-up study stated at the outset.
sentences.chinese: 該部分爲後續研究開宗明義。

sentences.english: The report states up front that science can change lives.
sentences.chinese: 這份白皮書開宗明義地指出了科學可以改變生活”。
